citations.narrative:
On 8 April 2025, it was noted during unannounced inspection that this carrier was conducting regulated activity without an
active registration. According to an airway bill dated 3/31/25 one live dog was transported to New Zealand. The USDA
registration for this airline has been cancelled since 5/25/2019. Each carrier and intermediate handler not required to be
licensed under section 3 of the Act and the regulations of this subchapter, shall register with the Secretary by completing
and filing a properly executed form.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Eduardo Vivas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.25(a) 
   
Requirements and procedures. 
On 8 April 2025, it was noted during unannounced inspection that this carrier was conducting regulated activity without an 
active registration. According to an airway bill dated 3/31/25 one live dog was transported to New Zealand. The USDA 
registration for this airline has been cancelled since 5/25/2019. Each carrier and intermediate handler not required to be 
licensed under section 3 of the Act and the regulations of this subchapter, shall register with the Secretary by completing 
and filing a properly executed form. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Eduardo Vivas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
